wikipedia_page.main: Douglas Muir McBain (22 September 1924 – 1 February 2008) was a Scottish footballer who played in the run to the semi final for Great Britain at the 1948 Summer Olympics. McBain played club football as a wing half for Dumbarton, Hamilton Academical, Queen's Park and Queen of the South.
